title: Matchmaking with a Broken Duke: A Historical Regency Romance Novel
features: As an art restorer, Miss Delaney, visited the Rokesby Castle to restore the precious paintings of a reluctant Duke. She had never been between people of the upper class but her manners and remarkable beauty will restore even the Duke’s heart…

She’s beautiful, unconventional, with a dazzling intelligence, and a heart full of love to give. In his eyes, she’s a portrait of perfection, and he’s irresistibly drawn to her. But he’s vowed never to love again. A storm rages in his heart every time they meet, as he fights against himself for the right to love her. How can he know that a mystery is set on bringing them together?

Max Midwinter, the handsome Duke of Rokesby, is lord of his castle above the sea. Lonely and bitter, he punishes himself for a past misdeed, swearing off love forever. When Leonie Delaney unexpectedly enters his life to restore a priceless painting, he experiences feelings he thought long dead. He’s tossed on a sea of anguish, struggling against himself to heal his wounded heart and win the lasting happiness he craves with the woman he adores . . . with a little unseen help.

Leonie Delaney is a skilled art restorer, sent to Rokesby Castle to restore precious artwork for the Midwinter family. It’s her first job without her uncle. How will the family react to a lone woman taking on the task? Receiving a chilly reception from the devilishly handsome but ill-tempered Duke of Rokesby, the usually confident initially Leonie fears him. But something, or someone, draws them together, and Leonie finds herself falling for the wounded duke. Convinced he can never love a mere restorer of paintings and is meant for another, Leonie fights to reign in her feelings. When Leonie’s life is endangered by another’s malice and she encounters a mysterious savior, the couple’s mutual love is unleashed at last.

*If you like powerful Dukes, loving characters, and a marvelous depiction of the majestic Regency and Victorian era, then "Matchmaking with a Broken Duke" is the novel for you.Free with Kindle Unlimited!
description: Lovely story with surprising twists, and HEA
"I liked the main characters to be good at heart and attracted to one another.The antagonist was properly evil at heart and we knew it from the beginning."
"I could not put this book down !! It was a beautiful love story, between two beautiful people !! It doesn't matter about the circumstances or what ranking you have, love will always win !!"
"Clean sweet, lots of fun, both the H and h knew what they wanted and went after it. I really like the fact that there were no long foolish misunderstandings."
Another great book by this author!​​​​​​​
"I really enjoyed this book. The author tells a great story (other reviewers have shared the highlights of the book) and it has a great ending, which I love!!!​​​​​​​"
"This book was done very well. Lots of humor and romance. It was written so that it was easy to picture the scenes. I have read several of your books and I really like your style.​​​​​​​"

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/ea19707291vbnsqr1ba37drfal._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Dorothy Sheldon', 'about': ['Dorothy is a Regency Historical novelist inspired by her mother’s favorite author, Georgette Heyer. Reading romance novels from a very young age was the beginning to capture her imagination into Romance books narrating the Regency era. She is a romantic soul and loves the way people express their love to others.', 'Her sister always stood by her in her writing career until she met her husband, who gave her four wonderful daughters and they now live in Texas. A dear dog and cat are not to be missed in the family.', 'Dorothy spends her free time listening to music, reading books, and baking delicious sweets. She likes to travel to see new places and learn more about historical facts of other countries. She also loves foreign languages and now speaks more than four!']}
